title: Roasted Asparagus
instructions: trim ends of asparagus and toss with olive oil, salt, pepper
place in a glass roasting dish and roast until tender but still firm when poked with the tip of a knife, about 7-10 minutes
remove from oven and transfer to serving platter. squeeze fresh lemon juice on top

title: Caramelized Brussel Sprouts
instructions: trim stem ends of brussel sprouts
in a skillet, heat the Splenda over medium heat until it begins to melt, shaking pan occasionally to heat Splenda evenly. Once Splenda starts to melt, reduce heat and cook until brown
add olive oil, stir. add vinegar and pancake syrup. cook and stir for 1 minute
carefully add the water and salt. bring to a boil, add brussel sprouts. return to boiling and reduce heat. cover and simmer for 6 minutes.
uncover and cook about 15 more minutes or until most of the liquid has been absorbed and the sprouts are coated with a golden glaze, gently stirring occasionally

title: Cauliflower Mashed Potatoes
ingredients: *optional: 1 packet IP leek, broccoli and cheese, chicken, or mushroom soup
instructions: steam or boil cauliflower until very soft
add seasonings to taste and soup packet if desired

title: Cauliflower Rice
instructions: using a food processor or blender, chop raw cauliflower until it is the size of rice
microwave in a covered dish for about 6 minutes
no need to add water! cauliflower absorbs water like crazy, and adding water will make it gummy
add the rice to a stir fry
